mapper.select: SELECT user_seq AS userSeq, user_email AS userEmail, user_pw AS userPw , user_nickname AS userNickname, user_pic AS userPic , input_dt AS inputDt, update_dt AS updateDt FROM user_master WHERE user_email = #{userEmail}
